raw: * Representation of a form. A form widget can contain one or more {@link Row} widgets.
* *Example*
* Here is an example of how to use the widget.
* <pre class='javascript'>
*   var title = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Title("Group");
*   var form = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Form();
*   form.add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.TextField(), "Username: ");
*   this.getRoot().add(title);
*   this.getRoot().add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.Single(form));
*
* This example creates a form and adds a row with a text field in it.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Representation of a form. A form widget can contain one or more {@link Row} widgets. Example Here is an example of how to use the widget. 

   var title = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Title("Group");
   var form = new qx.ui.mobile.form.Form();
   form.add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.TextField(), "Username: ");
   this.getRoot().add(title);
   this.getRoot().add(new qx.ui.mobile.form.renderer.Single(form));

This example creates a form and adds a row with a text field in it.

raw: * the renderer this form uses to be displayed

@description.name: @description
@description.body: the renderer this form uses to be displayed

* @lint ignoreDeprecated(alert)
* @return {Boolean|null} The validation result.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Validates the form using the {@link qx.ui.form.validation.Manager#validate} method.

raw: * Makes a row visible, identified by its group and row index.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Makes a row visible, identified by its group and row index.

raw: overridden
* Returns the invalid items of the form, which were determined by {@link qx.ui.mobile.form.Form#validate} before.
* It returns an empty array if no items are invalid.
* @return {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget[]} The invalid items of the form.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the invalid items of the form, which were determined by {@link qx.ui.mobile.form.Form#validate} before. It returns an empty array if no items are invalid.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.ui.mobile.core.Widget[]} The invalid items of the form.
